author: Paul Kasabian
title: Power 5 Official: Summer CFB Season Move 'Most Absurd Thing I've Heard so Far'
description: A report from Michael Smith of the   Sports Business Journal   indicated colleges have thought of moving the 2020 football season to the summer to avoid a potential second round of COVID-19 infections in the fall...
content:
Michael Conroy/Associated Press
A report from Michael Smith of the Sports Business Journal indicated colleges have thought of moving the 2020 football season to the summer to avoid a potential second round of COVID-19 infections in the fall.
At least one Po… [+1474 chars]
